33ba1cc3-d697-4962-a489-4f37d0694545.description: Automotive Technician shortages are expected to grow to over 800K by 2025. Upon successful completion of the requirements, a student is prepared to apply for a quick lane or entry level position with an automotive dealership or repair shop or one of our Ford Dealer partners. Participants completed Ford Automotive Career Exploration (ACE) automotive technician skill basics taught by a certified Ford ACE instructor. Participants learned about career opportunities within the industry.
33ba1cc3-d697-4962-a489-4f37d0694545.name: Automotive Technician Fundamentals (In partnership with Ford Motor Company)

alignments.name: Stackable To: AAS Automotive Technology Degree
alignments.description: Manufacturing Specific Programs: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA), Mopar Career Automotive Program (MCAP), Ford ASSET, Subaru, Lincoln.

alignments.name: Snap-on Industrial Certifications Embedded In Degree
alignments.description: Hand Tool Safety, Electrical Safety, 596 Meter, 650 Meter, Torque Theory, Torque Mechanical, Torque Electronic, Pro Cut Rotor Matching, Wheel Balancing Basics, Alignment Fundamentals, EHP V System Tire and Wheel, B2000 Wheel Balancing, Pro 42 Wheel Alignment,Verus Pro Labscope Operation & Data Management, Verus Pro Navigation and Scanner Operation

badge_template_activities.title: An introduction to the field of automotive technology and preparation for entry-level automotive employment. Topics include hand tool usage and safety, electrical safety, lift safety, personal protective equipment, oil changes, tire rotations, multi-point inspection, pollution prevention, career exploration, customer service, resume preparation, interview skills and job search skills.

9172265e-23c1-40e0-a978-5fc565e6acb5.description: Front office managers are needed in all business sectors. The earner learned the responsibilities for overseeing the daily operations of the front office of an organization, and supervisory skills to ensure they perform their duties in an appropriate manner. Earners gained strong communication skills to effectively communicate with employees, customers and business owners. Knowledge of U.S. employment laws is also a great asset.
9172265e-23c1-40e0-a978-5fc565e6acb5.name: Front Office Management

alignments.name: Stackable To: Front Office Management Advanced Microcredential
alignments.description: Areas include business communications, human resources, management, finance fundamentals and management information systems. Hands-on experience with application software teaches students how to organize data.General concepts of finance includes financial instruments, financial markets, the interpretation of financial statements and financial data.

alignments.name: Stackable To:
alignments.description: AAS Business Administration (24, 18, and 12 month options available)

badge_template_activities.title: This series of courses in business communications, management and human resources will be a great asset to an individual wanting to become a front office manager as well as to the company that employs them.

65c17042-edcc-49e2-a65a-4c836415217a.description: Courses included business communications, management and human resources, and provides additional skills in finance fundamentals and management information systems. Students used information technology to present data for business decisions. Through hands-on experience with application software students acquired the skills needed to organize data that adds value to business decisions. Concepts of financial instruments and markets, the interpretation of financial statements and data were covered.
65c17042-edcc-49e2-a65a-4c836415217a.name: Front Office Management Advanced

alignments.name: Stackable To: AAS Business Administration (24, 18, and 12 month option)

badge_template_activities.title: Areas include business communications, human resources, management, finance fundamentals and management information systems. Hands-on experience with application software teaches students how to organize data.General concepts of finance includes financial instruments, financial markets, the interpretation of financial statements and financial data.

1ede6920-25d6-4f5f-8aed-064044412877.description: The food industry employs more professionals than almost any other. In the United States, the industry is among the top three employers. Our programs deliver an exceptional education to grow the culinary industry workforce and distinguishes our graduates who obtain the highest level of knowledge, experience, and professionalism.A baking fundamentals competency demonstrates to prospective employers the skills you have obtained to excel as a professional baker in the food industry.
1ede6920-25d6-4f5f-8aed-064044412877.name: Baking Fundamentals

alignments.name: ServSafe Certification (Accredited by the National Restaurant Association)
alignments.description: Minimum Food Handler Certification Proficiency: Must achieve 75% passing rate on exam (Non-credit)

alignments.name: Baking Specialization Microcredential
Food Preparation Microcredential

badge_template_activities.title: This credential is obtained by completing three separate baking competencies and one ServSafe Food Handler industry partner certification accredited by the National Restaurant Association. A student who holds a valid certification may submit the original ServSafe Food Handler certificate to the Records Office for validation toward the microcredential.

82def16e-7816-4bd4-8b71-9c81730b88c1.description: A Financial Customer Service Representative is responsible for engaging with customers on behalf of their company. They provide introductory information to new customers and ensure that customers are satisfied with products and services. Escalating queries and troubleshooting issues with a product of service. Students learned business communication skills, information management skills, and finance fundamentals to prepare for career opportunities in financial industry.
82def16e-7816-4bd4-8b71-9c81730b88c1.name: Financial Customer Service Representative

alignments.name: Stackable To: AAS Business Administration

badge_template_activities.title: Visit the website and follow the steps to earn the microcredential.

d17bf811-f0fc-4549-ae6f-18a0bcb07fbe.description: The rise of the fitness industry has formed a need to hire certified Fitness Trainers. Individuals have the opportunity to work in commercial centers or form their own business conducting personal training sessions. Students studied how to assess clients and develop training programs to meet personal fitness goals and understand the effects of exercise on the human body. Personal Trainer certification exam accredited by the National Council on Strength and Fitness.
d17bf811-f0fc-4549-ae6f-18a0bcb07fbe.name: Fitness Trainer

alignments.name: Personal Trainer Certification
alignments.description: Minimum Personal Trainer Certification Proficiency: Must achieve 70% passing rate on exam (Non-credit)

alignments.name: Stackable To: AS Human Performance Studies

badge_template_activities.title: This credential includes passing the Fitness Trainer certification exam accredited by the National Council on Strength and Fitness. The certification exam is offered at the RCC Suffern campus. Students must download the digital certificate and submit the original certificate to the Records Office to be eligible for the microcredential.

92ce91c2-f9b7-4523-b508-4891059ecfc5.description: Topics included installation, repair, configuration, maintenance and management of computer hardware, operating systems, and software in home and corporate environments, along with an introduction to networking and security.Courses include one attempt at the TestOut® Client Pro and TestOut PC Pro® performance-based certification exams.
92ce91c2-f9b7-4523-b508-4891059ecfc5.name: IT Support Professional - Desktop Support

alignments.name: IT Support Professional - Networking and Security Microcredential
alignments.description: Building upon the skills learned in IT Support Professional-Desktop Support, courses include network device installation, configuration and management, network protocols, cabling, wired/wireless networks, firewalls, device and physical security, security policies, network and host defense, disaster and recovery planning and vulnerability assessment

alignments.name: Stackable To: AAS Cyber Security
Stackable To: AAS Computer Support Specialist
TestOut Client Pro Certification
alignments.description: The TestOut Client Pro certification exam measures an examinee's ability to complete tasks related to the following topics: Configuration. Management. Networking.

alignments.name: TestOut PC Pro Certification
alignments.description: The TestOut PC Pro Certification exam measures an examinee's ability to install, repair, configure, secure, and manage the following systems and devices: Computer Operating Systems, PC Hardware, PC Software, Basic Networking Devices and Printers, Mobile Devices

badge_template_activities.title: Certification exam is administered at the end of the course. Minimum TestOut® Certification Proficiency: Must achieve 1440 passing rate on TestOut® Client Pro exam (Non-credit). Must achieve 1420 passing rate on TestOut PC Pro® exam (Non-credit). Students must download the digital certificate and submit the original certificate to the Records Office to be eligible for the microcredential.

17b91bec-24ed-4323-b8fd-7005eff8abc2.description: Building upon the skills learned in IT Support Professional-Desktop Support, Networking and Security courses include network device installation, configuration and management, network protocols, cabling, wired and wireless networks, firewalls, device and physical security, security policies, network and host defense, disaster and recovery planning and vulnerability assessments. Courses include one attempt at the TestOut® Network Pro and TestOut Security Pro® performance-based certification exam
17b91bec-24ed-4323-b8fd-7005eff8abc2.name: IT Support Professional - Networking and Security

alignments.name: IT Support Professional - Desktop Support
alignments.description: Topics included installation, repair, configuration, maintenance and management of computer hardware, operating systems, and software in home and corporate environments, along with an introduction to networking and security.Courses include one attempt at the TestOut® Client Pro and TestOut PC Pro® performance-based certification exams.

alignments.name: Stackable To: AAS Computer Support Specialist
TestOut Network Pro Certification
alignments.description: The TestOut Network Pro exam measures an examinee’s management of hardware and software networking components and includes IP configuration, setting up wireless and wired networks, managing networks, basic network security, software updates, hardware upgrades and network protocols.

alignments.name: TestOut Security Pro Certification
alignments.description: The TestOut Security Pro Certification measures an examinee’s ability to implement layered security through group policy objects, access control lists, wireless and wired local area network security measures, and workstation and mobile device security measures.

badge_template_activities.title: Certification exam will be administered at the end of the course. Minimum TestOut® Certification Proficiency: Must achieve 1360 passing rate on TestOut® Network Pro exam (Non-credit). Must achieve 1400 passing rate on TestOut Security Pro® exam (Non-credit). Students must download the digital certificate and submit the original certificate to the Records Office to be eligible for the microcredential.

a3f0d952-415b-480b-9218-cabf4f9c8db6.description: This program is geared towards those who are Fitness Trainers and would like to expand their expertise in fitness and sport to become a certified Sports Nutrition Specialist. It is essential for Fitness Trainers to understand the importance of nutrition when it comes to devising an exercise program. The Sports Nutrition Specialist learned to assess a client’s diet and set up nutritional goals to assist in their conditioning programs.
a3f0d952-415b-480b-9218-cabf4f9c8db6.name: Sports Nutrition Specialist

alignments.name: Sports Nutrition Certification (Accedited by the National Council on Strength and Fitness)
alignments.description: Minimum Sports Nutrition Certification Proficiency: Must achieve 70% passing rate on exam (Non-credit)

alignments.name: Stackable To: AS Human Performance Studies

badge_template_activities.title: This credential includes passing the Sports Nutrition certification exam accredited by the National Council on Strength and Fitness. The certification exam is offered at the RCC Suffern campus. Students must download the digital certificate and submit the original certificate to the Records Office to be eligible for the microcredential.
